评论概述: Great hoodie but it could be better
评论详情: Awesome hoodie design all the way. Me being a pre teen in the mid 90’s the look of this hoodie was it. I’m going to have to return it though. I wear a size XL normally so seeing the product is 100% cotton and cotton shrinks I went up a size. Don’t do that, you will have to go up 2 sizes. That being said sadly I have to return it, but I will be re ordering 2 sizes up from my own size. I would highly recommend that to everyone who is in an XL size.
